title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 441.3 - Supplemental rating criteria
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 441.3 - Supplemental rating criteria

State Regulations

In addition to the criteria listed in section
440.8
of this

Title, the following criteria will be considered in rating park
projects: (a) the degree to which
local recreation, conservation or open space deficiencies will be addressed by
the project; and
(b) the degree to
which the project will primarily serve either a densely populated area where
recreational opportunities have sustained physical deterioration, decay, neglect or disinvestment or an area where a substantial proportion of the
population is of low income or otherwise disadvantaged and underserved with
respect to existing recreational opportunities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
441.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
